page.title: 10RECREATION-PASTIMES
page.content: Most of our playground games have rhymes which we have to say or sing. Sometimes we have to chase each other, sometimes we have to creep up on each other. Hot Chocolate is one of these. Any number can play. One person stands out in front and hides his face whilst the others try to reach him without being seen. If anyone is seen, everyone stands in a line, and one person touches the finger of the catcher. He says "Hot Chocolate", everyone runs and the person who gets caught then stands out in front to begin the game again. Red Letter is also played by any number. The caller tells them which letter is the red letter and that means that any one with that letter in their name cannot move when the letter is called.
